text: Desmiphora tristis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 2003. It is known from Colombia.BioLib.cz - Desmiphora tristis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphora Category:Beetles described in 2003
title: Desmiphora tristis
